jcr:root.description: Workflow for requesting and approving copy.
jcr:root.title: Request Copy

node1.description: Creates empty manuscript that the copy writer will complete
node1.title: Create Manuscript

node2.description: Please accept this task if you wish to take on this assignment. You will get a new task in your inbox with additional details after accepting this task.
node2.title: Generate Copy

metaData.argTaskDescription: Write copy for the brief given. You can update the manuscript attached to this item or drag a new manuscript in.

node3.description: copywriter may decide to no longer be interested in this work in which case he returns it to the pool.
node3.title: Back to pool if copywriter did not complete

metaData.argTaskDescription: Please approve or reject this copy.

node5.description: reassign back to copywriter if not aproved
node5.title: Decide if Approved

node6.description: The copy that was written was rejected and must be edited by the copywriter
node6.title: Rejected

metaData.argTaskDescription: The copy you wrote was rejected. Please see the comments and make adjustments.

node7.description: simple goto step which always sends for approval
node7.title: Send for approval again

node8.description: Notify the initiator that the copy has been approved
node8.title: Copy has been approved

metaData.argTaskDescription: The copy request has been completed. Please see payload for this task for the final copy.
